class D inherits from class C.init:
class C { constructor(...args) { for (x of args.entries()) { this[x[0]] = x[1]; } } method() { return 200; } static method() { return 100; } }
class D extends C { static method () { return 300; } method() { return super(); } }
tests: let d = new D('a',2,true,{a:4},[5]); d instanceof D;
let d = new D('a',2,true,{a:4},[5]); d instanceof D;
